attributes.action: Force GPs to start seeing patients face to face
attributes.additional_details: This is also the cause of misdiagnosis of patients and the deaths of those that cannot work the system put in place by the GP
attributes.background: Force GPs to open their doors and to start seeing patients face to face, without the need to fill in online forms that are far too complicated especially for the elderly and then wait days for a telephone consultation.  This is the cause of the overwhelmed hospitals

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
